post.description: Checks the availability of the given service namespace across all Windows Azure subscriptions. This is useful because the domain name is created based on the service namespace name.

put.description: Creates/Updates a service namespace. Once created, this namespace's resource manifest is immutable. This operation is idempotent.

parameters.description: The name of the resource group.

TopicCreateOrUpdateParameters.description: Parameters supplied to the CreateOrUpdate Topic operation.

AccessedAt.description: Message was sent, or the last time there was a receive request to this topic.

AutoDeleteOnIdle.description: TimeSpan idle interval after which the topic is automatically deleted. The minimum duration is 5 minutes.

AvailabilityStatus.description: Entity availability status for the topic.

CreatedAt.description: Exact time the message was created.

DefaultMessageTimeToLive.description: Default message time to live value. This is the duration after which the message expires, starting from when the message is sent to Service Bus. This is the default value used when TimeToLive is not set on a message itself.

DuplicateDetectionHistoryTimeWindow.description: TimeSpan structure that defines the duration of the duplicate detection history. The default value is 10 minutes..

EnableBatchedOperations.description: Value that indicates whether server-side batched operations are enabled..

EnableExpress.description: Value that indicates whether Express Entities are enabled. An express topic holds a message in memory temporarily before writing it to persistent storage.

EnableFilteringMessagesBeforePublishing.description: Whether messages should be filtered before publishing.

EnablePartitioning.description: Value that indicates whether the topic to be partitioned across multiple message brokers is enabled.

IsAnonymousAccessible.description: Value that indicates whether the message is anonymous accessible.

IsReadOnly.description: Value that indicates whether the entity description is read-only.

MaxSizeInMegabytes.description: Maximum size of the topic in megabytes, which is the size of memory allocated for the topic.

RequiresDuplicateDetection.description: Value indicating if this topic requires duplicate detection.

SizeInBytes.description: Size of the topic in bytes.

EntityStatus.description: Enumerates the possible values for the status of a messaging entity.

SupportOrdering.description: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the topic supports ordering.

UpdatedAt.description: The exact time the message has been updated.

TopicProperties.description: Represents the metadata description of the topic.

provisioningState.description: Gets or sets A non-terminal value (for example, “Accepted”, or “Created”).

location.description: Supported Azure location in which the resource exists.

value.description: Result of the List Topics operation.

nextLink.description: Link to the next set of results. Not empty if Value contains incomplete list of Topics

TopicListResult.description: The response of the List Topics operation.

type.description: Gets or sets ARM type of the namespace.

location.description: Gets or sets  the location of the resource.

properties.description: Gets or sets properties of the Queues.

QueueCreateOrUpdateParameters.description: Parameters supplied to the CreateOrUpdate Queue operation.

AccessedAt.description: Get last time a message was sent, or the last time there was a receive request to this queue.

AutoDeleteOnIdle.description: Gets or sets the TimeSpan idle interval after which the queue is automatically deleted. The minimum duration is 5 minutes.

AvailabilityStatus.description: Gets the entity availability status for the queue.

createdAt.description: Gets the exact time the message was created.

DefaultMessageTimeToLive.description: Gets or sets the default message time to live value. This is the duration after which the message expires, starting from when the message is sent to Service Bus. This is the default value used when TimeToLive is not set on a message itself.

DuplicateDetectionHistoryTimeWindow.description: Gets or sets the TimeSpan structure that defines the duration of the duplicate detection history. The default value is 10 minutes..

EnableBatchedOperations.description: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether server-side batched operations are enabled..

EnableDeadLetteringOnMessageExpiration.description: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether this queue has dead letter support when a message expires.

EnableExpress.description: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether Express Entities are enabled. An express queue holds a message in memory temporarily before writing it to persistent storage.

EnablePartitioning.description: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the queue to be partitioned across multiple message brokers is enabled.

ForwardDeadLetteredMessagesTo.description: Gets or sets the path to the recipient to which the dead lettered message is forwarded.

ForwardTo.description: Gets or sets the path to the recipient to which the message is forwarded.

IsAnonymousAccessible.description: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the message is anonymous accessible.

LockDuration.description: Gets or sets the duration of a peek lock; that is, the amount of time that the message is locked for other receivers. The maximum value for LockDuration is 5 minutes; the default value is 1 minute.

MaxDeliveryCount.description: Gets or sets the maximum delivery count. A message is automatically deadlettered after this number of deliveries.

MaxSizeInMegabytes.description: Gets or sets the maximum size of the queue in megabytes, which is the size of memory allocated for the queue.

MessageCount.description: Gets the number of messages in the queue.

MessageCountDetails.description: Gets message details for a queue.

Path.description: Gets or sets the name of the queue.

RequiresDuplicateDetection.description: Gets or sets the value indicating if this queue requires duplicate detection.

RequiresSession.description: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the queue supports the concept of session.

SizeInBytes.description: Gets the size of the queue in bytes.

EntityStatus.description: Enumerates the possible values for the status of a messaging entity.

SupportOrdering.description: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the queue supports ordering.

UpdatedAt.description: Gets the exact time the message has been updated.

UserMetadata.description: Gets or sets the user metadata.

QueueProperties.description: Represents the metadata description of the queue.

properties.description: Gets or sets properties of the Queues.

isAvailiable.description: Is true if the name is available and can be used to create new Namespace/ServiceBus. Otherwise false.

CheckAvailabilityParameters.description: Parameters supplied to the Check Name Availability for Namespace and ServiceBus.

isAvailiable.description: Is true if the name is available and can be used to create new Namespace/ServiceBus. Otherwise false.

region.description: Specifies the targeted region in which the namespace should be created. It can be any of the following values: Australia EastAustralia SoutheastCentral USEast USEast US 2West USNorth Central USSouth Central USEast AsiaSoutheast AsiaBrazil SouthJapan EastJapan WestNorth EuropeWest Europe

status.description: Status of the namespace. It can be any of these values:1 = Created/Active2 = Creating3 = Suspended4 = Deleting

createdAt.description: The time the namespace was created.

serviceBusEndpoint.description: Endpoint you can use to perform ServiceBus operations.

subscriptionId.description: The Id of the Azure subscription associated with the namespace.

critical.description: Whether or not the namespace is set as Critical.

Policykey.description: Key that needs to be regenerated .

RegenerateKeysParameters.description: Parameters supplied to the Regenerate Namespace Auth Rule.

NamespaceCreateOrUpdateParameters.description: Parameters supplied to the CreateOrUpdate Namespace operation.

Name.description: The resource type that this object applies to. Eg: NamespaceType

Tier.description: The tier of this particular SKU

Capacity.description: The messaging units or eventhub throughput units

rights.description: The rights associated with the rule.

SharedAccessAuthorizationRuleCreateOrUpd.description: Parameters supplied to the CreateOrUpdate Namespace AuthorizationRules.

value.description: Result of the List Namespace operation.

nextLink.description: Link to the next set of results. Not empty if Value contains incomplete list of Namespaces

NamespaceListResult.description: The response of the List Namespace operation.

value.description: Result of the List AuthorizationRules operation.

nextLink.description: Link to the next set of results. Not empty if Value contains incomplete list of AuthorizationRules

SharedAccessAuthorizationRuleListResult.description: The response of the List Namespace operation.

primaryConnectionString.description: PrimaryConnectionString of the created Namespace AuthorizationRule.

secondaryConnectionString.description: SecondaryConnectionString of the created Namespace AuthorizationRule

primaryKey.description: A base64-encoded 256-bit primary key for signing and validating the SAS token

secondaryKey.description: A base64-encoded 256-bit primary key for signing and validating the SAS token

keyName.description: A string that describes the authorization rule

SubscriptionIdParameter.name: subscriptionId
SubscriptionIdParameter.description: Gets subscription credentials which uniquely identify Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.
